inicio.dicho: Always educate your spirit and never stop learning. Life without culture is an image of death.

perfil.descripcion: Self-taught in frontend, backend, and database management. With great enthusiasm and teamwork, I aim to be part of your team, share ideas and knowledge, and contribute positively to your project.

proyectos.descripcion_proyecto: Website for a client showcasing their professional work in the field of hairstyling for both women and men (I will be working on this project to implement features like an online store and payment gateway.)
proyectos.descripcion_proyecto2: A website I am creating for a small jewelry business.
proyectos.descripcion_proyecto3: My first Django-created website, a fictional online video game store.
